metadata.title: CVE-2020-14940 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in io/gpx/GPXDocumentReader.java in TuxGuitar 1.5.4. It uses misconfigured XML parsers, leading to XXE while loading GP6 (.gpx) and GP7 (.gp) tablature files.

criterions.comment: tuxguitar package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
